name: Sol & Luna
description:
Submitted as part of the ArtCenter Game Jam 2021, by Team NARF. Made on Godot Game Engine.

Summary: Help Sol and Luna get back together and escape the tower through this local co-op platformer game!

PROGRAMMERS:
Ryan Lu
Samantha Macaraniag

LEVEL DESIGN:
Ryan Lu
Kyle Shieh

ART DESIGN:
Tiffany Book
Jiahn Chung

SOUND DESIGN:
Jared Acosta
Devon Mamawag
